description: Learn the fundamentals of programming using the C language. This course covers basic syntax, data types, control structures, and functions.
Explore the foundational concepts of algorithms. Topics include sorting, searching, graph algorithms, and algorithmic analysis.
Get started with C++ programming specifically tailored for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA),Covers STL & OOP
Master the implementation and usage of various data structures such as arrays, linked lists, trees, and graphs.
Learn Python programming from scratch. Covers basic syntax, data types, control structures, and popular libraries.
Explore the principles and practices of software engineering, including requirements gathering, design patterns, and testing methodologies.
Learn about cloud computing using Amazon Web Services (AWS). Topics include EC2, S3, Lambda, and best practices for cloud.
Gain expertise in MySQL database management. Covers database design, querying, optimization, and administration.
Develop problem-solving skills through algorithmic thinking and practice. Includes techniques for solving problems
